Bash(PYTHONPATH=/home/daniel/git/geoextent python -c "
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.DEBUG, format=''''%(levelname)s: %(message)s'''')

import geoextent.lib.extent as extent
result = extent.fromRemote(''''10.5281/zenodo.4593540'''', bbox=True)
print(''''Final bbox:'''', result.get(''''bbox''''))
")

import geoextent.lib.extent as extent
result = extent.fromFile(''test2.geojson'', bbox=True)
print(''Result bbox:'', result.get(''bbox''))
print(''Result crs:'', result.get(''crs''))
")
